GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v4.19.247
GSD.description:
phy: qcom-qmp: fix reset-controller leak on probe errors

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit a39d9eccb333b8c07c43ebea1c6dfda122378a0f, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit e78f3d15e115e8e764d4b1562b4fa538f2e22f6b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: phy: qcom-qmp: fix reset-controller leak on probe errors
